description:
If only he had a trump card.
Donald Trump answers his summons for jury duty in Manhattan this morning.

Seth Wenig / AP
There is something very satisfying about imagining Donald Trump sitting in a crowded jury duty waiting room and trying to relate with us, the common plebeians.
vine.co
Unfortunately, Donald Trump will almost certainly get out of serving. Here are seven ways you, like Trump, can get out of jury duty:

Seth Wenig / AP
Prove economic hardship.

vanityfair.com
View Entire List ›
title: 7 Ways Donald Trump Can Get Out Of Jury Duty
